p: Since the particles exit the MIVM in a mixed organic-water phase, it is necessary to remove the solvent and any unincorporated drug from the particles. Thus, particles were processed by dialysis followed by freeze-drying. The dialyzed particles were dried in a Scanvac, Coolsafe 55-4 Pro freeze dryer at 0.45â€“0.52 mbar for 24 h.
